info.title: Data Hub API
info.description:
Auto-generated API documentation for Data Hub.

There are currently some missing or incorrect details as we are limited by the web framework
we are using. These should be corrected over time as the relevant features in the framework are
enhanced.

get.description: Returns a serialised list of advisers subscribed to the order.

put.description:
Updates a subscriber list.
It adds/keeps/deletes the advisers based on the new list passed in.

get.description: Returns a serialised list of advisers assigned to the order.

patch.description:
Updates the list of assignees.
It adds/keeps/updates/deletes the advisers based on the new list passed in.

get.description:
Views for managing the authenticated user's company lists.

This covers:

- creating a list
- updating (i.e. renaming) a list
- deleting a list
- listing lists
- retrieving details of a single list

get.description:
Return the current user. This view is behind a login.

As this endpoint does not directly modify the database, it is opted out of atomic requests
so that it does not cause a transaction to be used for the lifetime of the request.

This should also ensure that when OAuth2 token introspection causes an access token to be
inserted into the database, it is visible to other requests as soon as possible.

See also: `datahub.core.reversion.NonAtomicRevisionMiddleware`.

post.description:
Proxy to DNB search API for POST requests.  This will also hydrate results
with Data Hub company details if the company exists (and can be matched)
on Data Hub.

Given a duns_number, get the data for the company from dnb-service
and create a record in DataHub.

Given a Data Hub Company ID and a duns-number, link the Data Hub
Company to the D&B record.
A wrapper around the investigation API endpoint for dnb-service.
Performs search and returns CSV file.
Performs search and returns CSV file.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: A UUID string identifying this company.

is_active.description: Designates whether this user should be treated as active. Deselect this instead of deleting accounts.

archived_documents_url_path.description: Legacy field. File browser path to the archived documents for this contact.
Legacy field. File browser path to the archived documents for this contact.
Legacy field. File browser path to the archived documents for this event.
Legacy field. File browser path to the archived documents for this interaction.

allow_blank_estimated_land_date.description: Controls whether estimated land date is a required field. Intended for projects migrated from CDMS in the verify win and won stages where legacy data for estimated land date does not exist.

archived_documents_url_path.description: Legacy field. File browser path to the archived documents for this investment project.

gross_value_added.description: Denormalised GVA value which is automatically populated using the gva multiplier and the foreign equity investment value.

allow_blank_possible_uk_regions.description: Controls whether possible UK regions is a required field (after the prospect stage). Intended for projects migrated from CDMS in the verify win and won stages where legacy data for possible UK regions does not exist.

contact_email.description: Legacy field. Contact email specified for this order.

contact_phone.description: Legacy field. Contact phone number specified for this order.

product_info.description: Legacy field. What is the product?

permission_to_approach_contacts.description: Legacy field. Can DIT speak to the contacts?

net_cost.description: Total hours * hourly rate in pence.

subtotal_cost.description: Net cost - discount value in pence.

vat_cost.description: VAT amount of subtotal in pence.

archived_documents_url_path.description: Legacy field. Link to the archived documents for this order.

subtotal_cost.description: Net cost - any discount in pence.

vat_cost.description: VAT amount of subtotal in pence.

transaction_reference.description: As it appears on the transaction receipt.

duns_number.description: Dun & Bradstreet unique identifier. Nine-digit number with leading zeros.

archived_documents_url_path.description: Legacy field. File browser path to the archived documents for this company.

transfer_reason.description: The reason data for this company was transferred.

archived_documents_url_path.description: Legacy field. File browser path to the archived documents for this contact.

number_of_employees.description: Only used when duns_number is set.

is_number_of_employees_estimated.description: Only used when duns_number is set.

turnover.description: In USD. Only used when duns_number is set.

is_turnover_estimated.description: Only used when duns_number is set.

pending_dnb_investigation.description: Whether this company is to be investigated by DNB.

export_potential.description: Score that signifies export potential, imported from Data Science

great_profile_status.description: Whether this company has a profile and agreed to be published or not

global_ultimate_duns_number.description: Dun & Bradstreet unique identifier for global ultimate.

completed_on.description: This should be filled in if the referral status is 'Complete'.

global_assets_under_management.description: Global assets under management amount in USD

name.description: Name to represent the item within the pipeline

likelihood_to_win.description: How likely the user thinks this proposal will result in success

expected_win_date.description: Approximate expected date for this proposal to succeed

archived_documents_url_path.description: Legacy field. File browser path to the archived documents for this event.
